 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְאוּבֵן‎</span><sub>71</sub> **proper name, masculine** ==Reuben==, <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ρουβην[ιν]</span> (***be-hold a son!*** but [[Gen.29.32|Gen 29:32]] makes = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָאָה בְּעָנְיִי‎</span> (!); [[BDB#Jos|Jos]]<sup>Ant. «JOSEPHUS:Antiquities 1:19»i. 19</sup>, 7 and others <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ρουβηλος</span>, [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> then perhaps = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***lion***, compare [[BDB#Di|Di]]); — 

**1.** eldest son of Jacob and Leah [[Gen.29.32|Gen 29:32]]; [[Gen.30.14|Gen 30:14]] + 11 t. Genesis; [[Exod.1.2|Exod 1:2]]; [[1Chr.2.1|1Chr 2:1]] as head of family or clan [[Exod.6.14|Exod 6:14]] (twice in verse); [[Num.1.20|Num 1:20]]; [[Num.26.5|Num 26:5]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Chr.5.1|1Chr 5:1]]; [[1Chr.5.3|1Chr 5:3]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵי אֱלִיאָב בֶּןרְֿא‎</span> [[Deut.11.6|Deut 11:6]]. 

**2.** as name of clan or tribe [[Judg.5.15|Judg 5:15]]; [[Judg.5.16|Judg 5:16]]; [[Deut.27.13|Deut 27:13]]; [[Josh.18.7|Josh 18:7]] ( +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּד‎</span>; both [[BDB#D|D]]), [[Deut.33.6|Deut 33:6]] (poem), [[Ezek.48.6|Ezek 48:6]]; [[Ezek.48.7|Ezek 48:7]]; [[Ezek.48.31|Ezek 48:31]]; [[Num.1.5|Num 1:5]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַטֵּה ר‎</span> [[Num.1.21|Num 1:21]]; [[Num.13.4|Num 13:4]]; [[Josh.20.8|Josh 20:8]]; [[Josh.21.7|Josh 21:7]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Chr.6.48|1Chr 6:48]]; [[1Chr.6.63|1Chr 6:63]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחֲנֵה ר‎</span> [[Num.2.10|Num 2:10]]; [[Num.2.16|Num 2:16]]; [[Num.10.18|Num 10:18]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵי ר‎</span>, as tribe, [[Num.16|Num 16]]: l b [[Num.32.37|Num 32:37]] (both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Num.2.10|Num 2:10]]; [[Num.7.20|Num 7:20]]; [[Num.26.5|Num 26:5]]; [[Josh.13.23|Josh 13:23]] (twice in verse) (all [[BDB#P|P]]), also (+ Gad and often Manasseh) [[Num.32.1|Num 32:1]]; [[Num.32.2|Num 32:2]]; [[Num.32.6|Num 32:6]]; [[Num.32.25|Num 32:25]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.4.12|Josh 4:12]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[Num.32.29|Num 32:29]]; [[Num.32.31|Num 32:31]]; [[Num.32.33|Num 32:33]]; [[Josh.22.9|Josh 22:9]] + 11 t. 22 (all [[BDB#P|P]]), compare [[1Chr.5.18|1Chr 5:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּןרֿ‎</span> as tribe [[Josh.15.6|Josh 15:6]]; [[Josh.18.7|Josh 18:7]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַטֵּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְנֵיֿ ר‎</span> [[Josh.13.15|Josh 13:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]).
